plugins.name: 图表库 Chart Master
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows designers to quickly insert predefined design frames into their projects with just a click. It simplifies the process of applying consistent styles, layouts, and content, enhancing productivity and design consistency.


Features Introduction

•Insert predefined design frames with a single click.

•Automatically apply layout settings and styles to frames.

•Supports multiple language interfaces (English, Chinese, etc.).

•Real-time error notifications and fallbacks for seamless user experience.


How to Use

1.Open the Figma plugin and choose your desired design frame.

2.Click the insert button to add the frame to your design.

3.Customize the frame as needed—styles and layouts are already applied.

4.Switch languages via the plugin settings if required.


Notes

•Ensure all necessary fonts are installed to avoid fallback issues.

•If errors occur, check the console for detailed messages.

•Language settings can be changed anytime through the plugin interface.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件让设计师可以轻松地在项目中插入预定义的设计框架。通过简化应用一致的样式、布局和内容的过程，插件提高了生产力和设计一致性。


功能说明

•一键插入预定义的设计框架。

•自动应用框架的布局设置和样式。

•支持多语言界面（英语、中文等）。

•实时错误通知和回退功能，确保无缝用户体验。


使用方法

1.打开 Figma 插件，选择您需要的设计框架。

2.点击插入按钮，将框架添加到您的设计中。

3.根据需要自定义框架—样式和布局已自动应用。

4.如果需要，通过插件设置切换语言。


注意事项

•确保已安装所有必要的字体，以避免回退问题。

•如果发生错误，请检查控制台获取详细信息。

•可以随时通过插件界面更改语言设置。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly Insert and Style Design Frames with a Click

plugins.name: WCAG 色彩对比检查 WCAG Color Checker
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin helps you evaluate the contrast ratio between text and background colors in your design frames, ensuring they meet WCAG accessibility standards. Perfect for designers aiming to improve readability and accessibility.


Function Introduction

•Check text-background contrast ratio within selected frames.

•Evaluate contrast according to WCAG standards (AAA, AA, A, Fail).

•Visualize contrast results and interact with your design directly.

•Automatic identification and highlighting of areas needing improvement.


Usage

1.Select a frame in your Figma file.

2.Run the plugin and click “Check Contrast.”

3.Review the results, which are sorted by contrast ratio.

4.Click on any result to highlight and improve specific text elements.


Notes

•Ensure text layers are properly named for better result identification.

•The plugin currently supports checking text against solid color backgrounds only.

•For best results, use the plugin on well-structured design frames.


介绍

这个 Figma 插件帮助您评估设计画板中文本与背景颜色之间的对比度，以确保其符合 WCAG 无障碍设计标准。非常适合希望提升可读性和无障碍性的设计师。


功能说明

•检查选定画板中文本与背景的对比度。

•根据 WCAG 标准评估对比度（AAA、AA、A、Fail）。

•可视化对比度结果并直接与设计交互。

•自动识别和突出显示需要改进的区域。


使用方法

1.在 Figma 文件中选择一个画板。

2.运行插件并点击“检查对比度”。

3.查看按对比度排序的结果。

4.点击任一结果以突出并改进特定的文本元素。


注意事项

•确保文本图层正确命名，以便更好地识别结果。

•插件目前仅支持检查与纯色背景的文本对比。

•为获得最佳效果，请在结构良好的设计画板上使用插件。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly check and improve contrast ratios in Figma frames with one click.

plugins.name: Token Exporter Pro
plugins.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

plugins.name: CircleTimer for Figma
plugins.description:
CircleTimer is a minimal, elegant countdown timer that runs inside Figma and FigJam.


Perfect for timeboxing activities like design critiques, interviews, sprints, and solo focus sessions.


• Choose from preset times (5, 15, 30, 60 mins)

• Or set a custom duration in minutes and seconds

• Optional “time’s up” alert

• Clean circular UI styled for Figma

• Escape key to close anytime


Works in both Figma Design and FigJam with zero setup. Designed to feel native to the platform.
plugins.tagline: Simple circular timer for focus sessions, critiques, or workshops in Figma and FigJam.

plugins.name: Jo - Instant Design Feedback
plugins.description:
Stop designing in the dark.

Jo gives you instant validation without leaving Figma.


Two ways to get unstuck:

🔍 Heuristic Check — Usability feedback against Nielsen's 10 principles

Select a frame → get ranked issues with specific fixes


📊 Quick Poll — Stakeholder sign-off in minutes

Select 2-4 frames → Generate link → teammates vote/comment (no Figma login required)


Why designers are loving Jo:

✅ In-Context Feedback: Feedback panel sits right next to your canvas.

🎯 Actionable Insights: Specific fixes, not vague opinions.

⏱️ Zero Meeting Overhead: Async feedback that actually works.

🔁 Iteration-Friendly: Tweak, test, and ship with confidence.


Perfect for:

Validating concepts, streamlining stakeholder buy-in, catching usability issues before dev handoff.


Ready to design with confidence?

Install Jo today and transform your feedback loops!
plugins.tagline: Get AI and teammate feedback on your designs. No meetings, no guesswork.

plugins.name: Token Extractor & Kotlin Exporter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you seamlessly export your design system tokens from Figma to Android development with Kotlin.


🎯 Key Features

• Scan selected components or frames for design tokens

• Supports primitives, spacing, and typography

• Converts tokens into Android-compatible Kotlin objects (Colors.kt, Dimens.kt, Typography.kt)

• Outputs clean, structured Kotlin code using dp, sp, and Color(...)

• Friendly UI with JSON preview and file export options


Perfect for Android teams using Jetpack Compose and looking to keep design & code in sync.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma to Android-ready Kotlin files.

plugins.name: Contrast Checker Pro
plugins.description:
🎨 Advanced Contrast Checker


🎨 Advanced Contrast Checker – Smart Contrast Analysis for Accessible Design


Take your design’s accessibility to the next level.


Advanced Contrast Checker: is a plugin built to detect and analyze contrast issues, even in complex scenarios like elements with **image backgrounds**.


🧠 Key Features:


1. 🎯 Accurate Detection


  1. Automatically identifies when an element has an **image as a background.
  2. Checks the layer hierarchy, scanning parent elements if necessary.


2. 📢 Clear and Visual Feedback


  1. Displays a prominent message when an image background is detected.
  2. Indicates that the contrast ratio is an approximation, offering a helpful reference.
  3. Includes visual icons for better clarity and user understanding.


3. 🌍 Multilingual Support


  1. Available in English, Spanish, and Chinese.
  2. Automatically switches language based on your Figma settings.


4. 🤖 Intelligent Behavior


  1. No color suggestions are shown when the background is an image.
  2. Uses a light gray approximation** to estimate contrast without misleading results.



Designed for creators who care about building **visually inclusive and accessible interfaces**, without compromising on precision or speed.


With 🎨 Advanced Contrast Checker accessibility becomes a natural part of your design workflow.
plugins.tagline: Smart contrast checking, even with image backgrounds.

plugins.name: Tablify
plugins.description:
Tablify is a powerful and flexible plugin that turns structured data into clean, styled tables directly in your Figma files. Whether you’re working with CSVs, Google Sheets, Excel files, or even Word documents, Tablify makes it effortless to visualize your data with consistency and control.


Features


Multiple Input Formats


  1. Upload from CSV, TSV, Excel (.xlsx/.xls), Word (.docx), PDF, HTML, XML, ODS, ODT
  2. Supports Google Sheets via public URL — just paste the link, choose a sheet, and you’re ready to go
  3. Drag & drop supported for local files


Intelligent Parsing


  1. Detects and handles multiple tables per document (e.g. Excel sheets or Word tables)
  2. Automatically cleans and parses content for structured layout
  3. Handles complex table structures, colspans, and headers


Design-Ready Tables


  1. Generates clean, structured Figma components
  2. Supports auto layout or fixed layout styles
  3. Responsive to Figma color variables, padding, radius, fonts, and more


Customization Options


  1. Auto Layout
  2. Header Row
  3. Style Variables (automatically created and bound)
  4. Automatically generates reusable tokens for colors, sizes, and text styles


Perfect for


  1. UI and product designers
  2. Dashboards, admin panels, data-heavy UIs
  3. Rapid prototyping with live spreadsheet content
  4. Importing structured data into Figma layouts with no manual copying


Why Tablify?


Unlike basic table creators, Tablify focuses on precision, flexibility, and deep Figma integration. It’s built for speed and scale — helping you go from spreadsheet to structured layout in seconds.


💬 Questions or feedback? Telegram ・ Email

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Table Generator for Figma

plugins.name: Rename by text list
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you rename multiple layers in bulk using a text-based list.

Simply select two Auto Layout frames:

  1. One containing the elements to rename (any layer type)
  2. One containing text nodes with the desired names

The plugin will rename each element in the first frame using the corresponding text content from the second frame, based on their order in the layers panel.
plugins.tagline: Rename one list of items by another list of text items

plugins.name: 液态玻璃生成器 Liquid Glass Generator
plugins.description:
介绍

Liquid Glass 是一款帮助设计师快速创建液态玻璃风格 UI 效果的 Figma 插件，可模拟现代界面中常见的毛玻璃、层叠光影等质感表现。


功能说明

•一键生成包含背景模糊、渐变描边和透明填充的液态玻璃容器

•支持调节透明度和模糊强度

•自动叠加纹理图层，增强真实感

•创建位置自动居中显示在当前视图中心


使用方法

1.在 Figma 插件菜单中运行 Liquid Glass

2.设置透明度和模糊参数

3.点击 Apply 按钮生成液态玻璃框

4.自动居中展示，可根据需要自由拖动或组合使用


注意事项

•推荐用于浅色或模糊背景下，视觉更佳

•可与其他 UI 元素组合使用增强表现力

•在复杂画布上运行时可能略有延迟


Introduction

Liquid Glass is a Figma plugin for designers who want to create realistic glassmorphism UI effects effortlessly. It simulates the layered, frosted, and glowing look commonly seen in modern interfaces.


Function Description

•Adds a liquid glass style frame with background blur, angular stroke, and gradient fills

•Includes configurable opacity and blur settings

•Adds optional layered texture for enhanced realism

•Automatically centers the effect on your current viewport


How to Use

1.Run the plugin from the Figma plugins menu

2.Adjust opacity and blur in the popup panel

3.Click “Apply” to generate a liquid glass frame

4.The generated element appears centered in your viewport


Notes

•Works best on light or blurred backgrounds

•You can group the frame with existing UI elements

•Performance may vary with complex canvases

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Create beautiful glassmorphism effects instantly

plugins.name: Dialekt
plugins.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  1. Find all text content within the selected frame.
  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
plugins.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

136509.name: Dialekt
136509.description:
Stop manually copy-pasting text for different languages! Dialekt helps you visualize localized designs early in your UX process. Simply select a mobile frame containing your text layers, and this plugin will:

  2. Automatically create five new frames, perfectly aligned.
  3. Translate the text in each new frame into Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, and French.

Ideal for designers working on multi-language apps who need to quickly see how text will look and fit in different languages during the wireframing or mockup stage.


Key Features:

  1. Translates text into 5 pre-set languages: Arabic, Spanish, Dutch, Portuguese, French.
  2. Automatically duplicates the selected frame for each language.
  3. Preserves original layout and styling (text length may vary).
  4. Simple few clicks operation.
136509.tagline: Translate your designs into multiple languages

plugins.name: Layer Query
plugins.description:
A powerful layer selection plugin that lets you find and select layers based on their design properties and custom component properties. Perfect for managing large design files and design systems efficiently.


## Key Features


- Multi-property search with combination filters

- Custom component property support (boolean, text, variant, instance swap)

- Flexible search scope: Entire file, Current page, Root frame, or Selected frames

- Search results with page grouping and navigation

- Real-time search progress with cancellation support

- Cross-page layer selection and navigation


## Supported Properties


**Typography:** Font size, font family, line height, text alignment, text content

**Fill:** Fill color, opacity

**Size:** Width, height

**Padding:** All directions (top, bottom, left, right, vertical, horizontal)

**Auto Layout:** Direction, sizing, alignment, item spacing

**Stroke:** Stroke color, stroke width

**Corner Radius:** All corners and individual corner values

**Layer:** Layer name, structure, type, opacity

**Position:** X and Y coordinates

**Custom:** Component instance properties


## Perfect For


- Design system maintenance and auditing

- Finding layers with specific styling across large files

- Quality assurance and design consistency checks

- Efficient layer organization and cleanup

- Component property management


Save hours of manual searching with precise property-based queries. Transform your Figma workflow from manual hunting to smart selection.


## Beta Version


This plugin is currently in beta. Please report any issues or feedback to help improve the experience.
plugins.tagline: Query and select layers by properties including custom components. Advanced search for efficiency.

136490.name: Layer Query
136490.description:

plugins.name: 清除/隐藏切片 Clear or Hide Slice
plugins.description:
介绍

清除切片 Clear Slice 是一个高效的图层管理插件，可一键清理选区内的所有 Slice 图层，并提供隐藏/显示控制选项。适用于批量处理切图冗余、整理输出前的画板。


功能说明

  1. 清除选中范围内所有 Slice 图层
  2. 可选是否解除组件实例后再处理
  3. 支持隐藏和显示 Slice 图层
  4. 多操作入口，灵活控制图层状态


使用方法

  1. 选择任意 Frame、Component 或 Instance
  2. 打开插件，勾选是否解除组件实例
  3. 点击所需操作按钮（清除 / 隐藏 / 显示）
  4. 插件将自动处理所有嵌套 Slice 图层


注意事项

  1. 若组件为受保护实例，请先手动解除
  2. 操作不可撤销，建议操作前先保存版本
  3. 插件默认递归处理所有子图层


Introduction

Clear Slice is a lightweight utility plugin that helps you remove, hide, or show all Slice layers within selected elements—ideal for cleaning up export slices before delivery.


Function Description

  1. Remove all Slice layers in the selection
  2. Optional: auto-detach instance before processing
  3. Hide or show Slice layers instead of deleting
  4. Simple UI with precise layer control options


How to Use

  1. Select any Frame, Component, or Instance
  2. Open the plugin and toggle "Detach instance" as needed
  3. Click your desired action: Clear / Hide / Show
  4. The plugin processes all nested slices recursively


Notes

  1. Protected components may require manual detaching
  2. Changes are not reversible — save your work before use
  3. The plugin processes all child layers in depth

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Clean up slice layers with one click and full control

plugins.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
plugins.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.

accepted.name: Anmol Kumar
accepted.description: i skip meals to design stuff ✷

plugins.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

135549.name: Artboard Theme Switcher
135549.description:
A lightweight plugin for switching between light and dark themes while preserving your design work.


Hierarchical Color System

Automatically adjusts section colors based on nesting depth. Parent sections use your defined colors, while child sections receive calculated brightness adjustments (-10 for light mode, +10 for dark mode per level).


Frame Protection

Multi-layer protection ensures frames, components, and instances are never modified. Only page backgrounds and sections are affected.


Performance Optimized

48KB bundle with sub-200ms execution time. Uses efficient HSB color calculations for smooth operation.


How Hierarchical Coloring Works

  1. Light Mode: Child sections get progressively darker (-10 brightness per nesting level)
  2. Dark Mode: Child sections get progressively lighter (+10 brightness per nesting level)


This creates visual depth automatically without manual configuration. Frame content and designed elements remain completely protected.
135549.tagline: Easily Switch Between Dark and Light Colour themes for your Figma Pages and Sections

135435.name: Content Generator
135435.description:
This plugin lets you replace selected text layers with smart, AI-generated content based on your own descriptions. No more lorem ipsum—just real, context-aware mock text that fits your design.


How to use

Select one or more text layers, then enter the kind of content you'd like to generate—like “names,” “job titles,” or “short bios”—and the plugin will fill them in instantly.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access a local backend server during development and a deployed backend server for generating content using OpenAI.

135435.tagline: Generate realistic text content in Figma instantly—based on your own prompts.

plugins.name: Wemessage Text to Excel
plugins.description:
Use this tool to export text to excel sheets.

The tool exports text from top to bottom using X,Y coordinates.

each main layer is separated to it's own sheet
plugins.tagline: Export text to excel by Wemessage

134590.name: Wemessage Text to Excel

The tool exports text from top to bottom using X,Y coordinates.

each main layer is separated to it's own sheet
134590.tagline: Export text to excel by Wemessage

plugins.name: 文案提取与替换 Text Extractor & Replacer
plugins.description:
介绍

文案提取与替换是一款高效实用的 Figma 插件，可快速提取选中元素中的文本，并支持批量修改与一键替换，适用于多语言版本设计、内容本地化与运营迭代场景。


功能说明

  1. 提取选中节点中的全部文本内容
  2. 自动合并重复文案并展示唯一列表
  3. 可逐条输入替换文案
  4. 支持一键替换全部或单条替换
  5. 支持复制原文案、一键恢复初始值
  6. 替换后自动更新当前原文显示


使用方法

  1. 选中一个或多个页面元素
  2. 点击【📋 提取选中文案】，展示全部原文案
  3. 输入对应的替换内容
  4. 点击【替换】按钮应用更改（可单条或全部替换）
  5. 点击【复制】获取原文，或点击【恢复】重填初始内容


注意事项

  1. 插件执行替换前需加载原文字体（已自动处理）
  2. 替换仅影响文本内容，不修改字体样式
  3. 替换基于精确匹配，请确保输入一致
  4. 请在提取前确保已选中有效节点


Introduction

Text Extractor & Replacer is a practical Figma plugin designed to help you quickly extract and batch replace text from selected elements—ideal for multi-language design workflows, localization, and content iteration.


Function Description

  1. Extract all text from selected nodes
  2. Display a unique list of original strings
  3. Edit replacements in a unified interface
  4. One-click replace for individual or all text
  5. Copy original text and restore initial values anytime
  6. Auto-update "original" label after each replacement


How to Use

  1. Select one or more elements in your Figma file
  2. Click 📋 Extract Text to list all unique texts
  3. Input replacement values next to each entry
  4. Click Replace (per-row or globally) to apply changes
  5. Use Copy to copy source text or Restore to revert input


Notes

  1. Font loading is required before text replacement (handled automatically)
  2. This plugin only replaces text values, not font styles
  3. Replacements are based on exact match
  4. Make sure to select nodes before extraction

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quickly extract and replace text in bulk with ease

plugins.tagline: generate color palette

131548.description: Generate a full Material-style color scale from any base color. Automatically creates 10 consistent shades for design systems.

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin does not require any network access.

plugins.name: AutoLayout Direction Toggler
plugins.description: Not sure why Figma doesn’t have a built-in shortcut for this—so I made one. This plugin lets you quickly toggle Auto Layout direction and pair it with custom app shortcuts for faster workflows. But heads up: since plugin shortcuts aren't supported in this version, you'll still need to set up an OS-level app shortcut manually. Not ideal, but it works.
plugins.tagline: Switch Auto Layout direction instantly—hook it up with your own app shortcut for speed.

131143.name: AutoLayout Direction Toggler
131143.description: Not sure why Figma doesn’t have a built-in shortcut for this—so I made one. This plugin lets you quickly toggle Auto Layout direction and pair it with custom app shortcuts for faster workflows. But heads up: since plugin shortcuts aren't supported in this version, you'll still need to set up an OS-level app shortcut manually. Not ideal, but it works.
131143.tagline: Switch Auto Layout direction instantly—hook it up with your own app shortcut for speed.

networkAccess.reasoning: 需要访问 Figma API 获取版本历史，以及发送数据到飞书和Slack Webhook
